com.TomBAN.BoulderDash.Game.Controller

Class BoulderDashController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.TomBAN.BoulderDash.Game.Controller.BoulderDashController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NewHighScoreListenner, Observer

    public class BoulderDashController
extends Object
implements Observer, NewHighScoreListenner
    This class control all the game : - Set up the view system - Load maps from mySQL using the MySQL class - Create all models needed - Instantiate and bind player controllers - Save all new score in mySQL
    Author:
    TomBANCHEREAU
